name: Boon of the Ascended
description:
Draw upon the power of the Ascended for 10 sec, granting you access to Ascended Nova, replacing Smite with Ascended Blast, and increasing movement speed by 50%.

Upon expiration, releases an Ascended Eruption:

Explode for up to 11,608 Arcane damage to enemies and 8,928 healing to allies within 15 yds, based on number of targets. Damage and healing increased by 3% for each stack of Boon of the Ascended.
